scripts.vm:provision: multipass launch --name umbrel-dev --cpus 2 --memory 4G --disk 50G --mount $PWD:/opt/umbrel 23.10 && multipass exec umbrel-dev -- scripts/provision-vm
scripts.vm:update: multipass launch --name umbrel-dev --cpus 2 --memory 4G --disk 50G --mount $PWD:/opt/umbrel 23.10 && multipass exec umbrel-dev -- scripts/provision-vm
scripts.vm:umbreld: multipass exec umbrel-dev -- bash -c 'cd /opt/umbrel/packages/umbreld && sudo npm run start -- --data-directory ./data --log-level verbose'
scripts.vm:ui: multipass exec umbrel-dev -- bash -c 'cd /opt/umbrel/packages/ui && sudo pnpm run dev'
